summary: An email from an FBI forensic accountant in New York, forwarding information that the Assistant U.S. Attorneys (AUSAs) have decided not to pursue Ghislaine Maxwell's assets. The email is brief and appears to be an internal FYI update.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, whose assets the AUSAs have decided not to pursue.

events.title: Decision not to pursue Maxwell's assets
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorneys (AUSAs) decide to pass on going after Ghislaine Maxwell's assets.

locations.name: FBI New York Field Office
locations.context: Location of the sender, a forensic accountant.

keyFacts: The email is dated April 15, 2022, after Ghislaine Maxwell's conviction.
Assistant U.S. Attorneys (AUSAs) decided not to pursue Ghislaine Maxwell's assets.
The email is sent from an FBI forensic accountant at the New York Field Office.
The communication is an internal FYI update regarding the asset forfeiture decision.
